mapper.select: SELECT f.*, d.dir_path, d.dir_id, u.user_id, u.username FROM file_inf f, dir_inf d, user_inf u WHERE f.file_status = 1 AND f.file_dir_id = d.dir_id AND f.file_upload_user_id = u.user_id
SELECT * FROM file_inf WHERE file_upload_user_id = #{id} AND (file_type = 'gif' OR file_type = 'png' OR file_type='jpg' OR file_type = 'jpeg' OR file_type = 'ico') ORDER BY file_upload_time DESC

SELECT * FROM file_inf WHERE file_upload_user_id = #{id} AND (file_type = 'docx' OR file_type = 'doc' OR file_type='ppt' OR file_type = 'pptx' OR file_type = 'xls' OR file_type = 'xlsx' OR file_type='txt') ORDER BY file_upload_time DESC
